metadata.title: Sport-Tek - Ladies Colorblock Hooded Windbreaker Jacket. LST76,Small,Forest Green / White
features: With a drawcord hood and enduring athletic style this jacket is perfect for outdoor sports or everyday excursions. ; 100% polyester shell; Jersey lining with mesh insets at gussets for added breathability ; Gently contoured silhouette; Drawcord hood with toggles; Front zippered pockets ; Articulated elbows for greater mobility ; Half elastic half self fabric cuffs for comfort ; Drawcord hem with toggle;
